name: Aunt
description: Female character is [a biological] aunt.

name: Boss
description: Character who has a position of power over their scene partner in a shared place of business.

name: Boyfriend
description: Male character who is in a committed, unmarried relationship with a scene partner.

name: Brother
description: Character is biological brother to scene partner

name: Brother In Law
description: Character presented as brother-in-law to a scene partner

name: Classmates
description: Characters who attend the same class or school as their scene partner.

name: Employee's Wife
